attributes.action: stop the new assessment that will be in october 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we are against the new assessment that tells what people with sickness and disabilities can do.
also that the gp sicknote means nothing to you, our own doctor would know us most rather than a stranger willing to right what he she thinks we can do.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
